title: LinkedIn Recon
description:
A fictional company called 'CyberVault Solutions' recently posted a job for a 'Senior Penetration Tester'. The posting mentions a specific certification as required. What OSINT technique would you use to find the hiring manager's name?

Submit the name of the technique as: flag{technique_name}
hints: Think about how LinkedIn connections work
The technique involves building a profile from social media
